title: Growth Quiz 7

questions.text: How do I most want you to support my goals?
choices: Encourage me and believe in me
Give me space to pursue them independently

questions.text: What's the best way you can help when I'm struggling with a goal?
choices: Remind me why it matters to me

questions.text: How do I want you to react when I share a new dream or goal?
choices: Get excited and enthusiastic with me
Help me make a plan to achieve it

questions.text: What do I need from you when I fail or face setbacks?
choices: Help seeing what I can learn

questions.text: How can you best celebrate my achievements with me?
choices: Make a big deal and celebrate publicly
Express how proud you are of me

description: Learn about your goals for personal and shared growth.
